space.gui.pipeline.viewable

Interface ViewableObject

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ViewableBeam, ViewableDoor, ViewableOpenable, ViewablePlayer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Beam, BeamShooter, Bullet, Button, Chair, Character, Chest, Container, Door, Entity, Key, Light, NonStationary, Player, Stationary, Table, Teleporter, Turret, Wallet

    public interface ViewableObject
    A nobject that can be viewed in the renderer
    Author:
    Simon Pinfold (300280028)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getAngle()
      Gets the objects rotation around the y axis in degrees Some objects may not have meaningful angles, in this case the return value can be anything
      float getCollisionRadius()
      Get the collision radius of the object
      float getElevation()
      The elevation off the ground of the object
      Vector2D getPosition()
      The position in the world of the object
      java.lang.String getType()
      The type of the object - as a rule just derived from the class name
